texto-advertencia-modal-entradas: Click on name attraction redirects the official page

valores.ent-desc-parque-nacional-iguazu: Immersive circuits that allow you to walk over, under, and next to the falls, culminating at the Devil's Throat.
valores.ent-desc-guira-oga: Wildlife rescue and rehabilitation center, focused on the conservation of species from the Misiones jungle.
valores.ent-desc-la-aripuca: Cultural and ecological theme park with a giant monument built from rescued trees, promoting environmental awareness.
valores.ent-desc-icebar-iguazu: Ice bar at -10°C in the middle of the subtropical jungle, with an open bar for 30 minutes.
valores.ent-desc-parque-nacional-do-iguacu: Offers spectacular panoramic views of the falls, allowing you to appreciate the full scale of the waterfall system.
valores.ent-horario-parque-nacional-do-iguacu: Mon-Fri: 9:00 AM-4:00 PM; Sat-Sun: 8:30 AM-4:00 PM.
valores.ent-desc-parque-das-aves: Immersive bird sanctuary, focused on the conservation of Atlantic Forest species, with walk-through aviaries.
valores.ent-desc-templo-budista-chen-tien: A haven of peace with over 120 statues, serene gardens, and panoramic views of Foz do Iguaçu and Paraguay.
valores.ent-desc-marco-das-tres-fronteiras: Tourist complex at the meeting point of Brazil, Argentina, and Paraguay, ideal for sunset and cultural shows.
valores.ent-desc-represa-de-itaipu: One of the world's largest hydroelectric power plants, a marvel of modern engineering offering panoramic tours.
valores.ent-horario-represa-de-itaipu: Every day, 8:30 AM to 4:00 PM (Panoramic Tour).
